Chicago.WLS-TV: WLS-TV, virtual channel 7 (UHF digital channel 44), is an ABC owned-and-operated television station licensed to Chicago, Illinois, United States. The station is owned by the ABC Owned Television Stations subsidiary of The Walt Disney Company. WLS-TV's studios are located on North State Street in the Chicago Loop, and its transmitter is located atop the Willis Tower on South Wacker Drive.
